item.title: Large pothole in road, very dangerous, 17th February
item.description:
Huge pothole in the road, 15cm deep in places, long gouge along the road. Needs immediate fix, raised on Tuesday 17 Feb

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Drain outside 19 Leacey Mews is full of mud and support is broken, 17th February
item.description:
The drain outside 19 Leacey Mews, Churchdown GL3 1PD is full of mud and the drain support is broken. This is the drain that all surface water in this area drains to. As such, this area becomes very flooded in heavy rain. I have tried to keep as much mud away as possible but it needs a deeper clean and repair to the grate support.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leacey Mews, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
